languages.text: {n}Вы склоняетесь над телом погибшего. Несмотря на многочисленные пятна крови на коже и одежде, мужчина не был серьезно ранен. Единственное заметное повреждение — на лице: нос мертвеца изуродован, и из него сочится бурая склизкая масса, пятнающая губы и подбородок.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Вы склоняетесь над телом погибшего. Несмотря на многочисленные пятна крови на коже и одежде, мужчина не был серьезно ранен. Единственное заметное повреждение — на лице: нос мертвеца изуродован, и из него сочится бурая склизкая масса, пятнающая губы и подбородок.{/n}

languages.text: {n}You bend over the body. Despite the numerous bloodstains on his skin and clothes, the officer had not been seriously wounded. The only noticeable injury is on his face — his nose is disfigured, and a red, slimy substance is streaming from it, staining his mouth and chin.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы склоняетесь над телом погибшего. Несмотря на многочисленные пятна крови на коже и одежде, мужчина не был серьезно ранен. Единственное заметное повреждение — на лице: нос мертвеца изуродован, и из него сочится бурая склизкая масса, пятнающая губы и подбородок.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You bend over the body. Despite the numerous bloodstains on his skin and clothes, the officer had not been seriously wounded. The only noticeable injury is on his face — his nose is disfigured, and a red, slimy substance is streaming from it, staining his mouth and chin.{/n}

{n}You bend over the body. Despite the numerous bloodstains on his skin and clothes, the officer had not been seriously wounded. The only noticeable injury is on his face — his nose is disfigured, and a red, slimy substance is streaming from it, staining his mouth and chin.{/n}

{n}You bend over the body. Despite the numerous bloodstains on his skin and clothes, the officer had not been seriously wounded. The only noticeable injury is on his face — his nose is disfigured, and a red, slimy substance is streaming from it, staining his mouth and chin.{/n}

{n}You bend over the body. Despite the numerous bloodstains on his skin and clothes, the officer had not been seriously wounded. The only noticeable injury is on his face — his nose is disfigured, and a red, slimy substance is streaming from it, staining his mouth and chin.{/n}

languages.text: {n}彼の死体の近くへかがんだ。皮膚や衣服に多数の血痕があるにもかかわらず、この士官は重傷を負っていなかった。唯一目立つ傷は顔にしかない。鼻は変形し、そこから赤くドロドロとした液体が流れ出ていて、彼の口と顎を汚している。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You bend over the body. Despite the numerous bloodstains on his skin and clothes, the officer had not been seriously wounded. The only noticeable injury is on his face — his nose is disfigured, and a red, slimy substance is streaming from it, staining his mouth and chin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}彼の死体の近くへかがんだ。皮膚や衣服に多数の血痕があるにもかかわらず、この士官は重傷を負っていなかった。唯一目立つ傷は顔にしかない――鼻は変形し、そこから赤くドロドロとした液体が流れ出ていて、彼の口と顎を汚している。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你俯下身，看着这具尸体。尽管这位军官的皮肤和衣服满是血迹，但他并没有受到重伤。唯一明显的外伤是在他的脸上，他的鼻子被打烂了，黏糊糊的红色液体流了出来，弄脏了他的嘴和下巴。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You bend over the body. Despite the numerous bloodstains on his skin and clothes, the officer had not been seriously wounded. The only noticeable injury is on his face — his nose is disfigured, and a red, slimy substance is streaming from it, staining his mouth and chin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你俯下身，看着这具尸体。尽管这位军官的皮肤和衣服满是血迹，但他并没有受到重伤。唯一明显的外伤是在他的脸上，他的鼻子被打烂了，黏糊糊的红色液体流了出来，弄脏了他的嘴和下巴。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Te inclinas sobre el cuerpo. A pesar de las numerosas manchas de sangre en su piel y su ropa, el oficial no estaba herido de gravedad. La única herida notable está en su cara. Su nariz está desfigurada y una sustancia roja y viscosa brota de ella, manchando su boca y su barbilla.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You bend over the body. Despite the numerous bloodstains on his skin and clothes, the officer had not been seriously wounded. The only noticeable injury is on his face — his nose is disfigured, and a red, slimy substance is streaming from it, staining his mouth and chin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Te inclinas sobre el cuerpo. A pesar de las numerosas manchas de sangre en su piel y su ropa, el oficial no estaba herido de gravedad. La única herida notable está en su cara. Su nariz está desfigurada y una sustancia roja y viscosa brota de ella, manchando su boca y su barbilla.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous vous penchez sur son cadavre. Malgré les nombreuses traces de sang sur sa peau et ses vêtements, l'officier n'a subi aucune blessure grave. La seule marque visible se trouve sur son visage : son nez est difforme et une substance rouge gluante s'en écoule, lui tachant la bouche et le menton.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You bend over the body. Despite the numerous bloodstains on his skin and clothes, the officer had not been seriously wounded. The only noticeable injury is on his face — his nose is disfigured, and a red, slimy substance is streaming from it, staining his mouth and chin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous vous penchez sur son cadavre. Malgré les nombreuses traces de sang sur sa peau et ses vêtements, l'officier n'a subi aucune blessure grave. La seule marque visible se trouve sur son visage : son nez est difforme et une substance rouge gluante s'en écoule, lui tachant la bouche et le menton.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du beugst dich über die Leiche. Trotz der zahlreichen Blutspuren auf Haut und Kleidung war der Offizier nicht ernsthaft verwundet. Die einzig sichtbare Verletzung befindet sich in seinem Gesicht – seine Nase ist deformiert und gibt eine rote, schleimige Substanz frei, die Mund und Kinn bedeckt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You bend over the body. Despite the numerous bloodstains on his skin and clothes, the officer had not been seriously wounded. The only noticeable injury is on his face — his nose is disfigured, and a red, slimy substance is streaming from it, staining his mouth and chin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du beugst dich über die Leiche. Trotz der zahlreichen Blutflecken auf Haut und Kleidung war der Offizier nicht ernsthaft verwundet. Die einzig sichtbare Verletzung befindet sich in seinem Gesicht – seine Nase ist deformiert und gibt eine rote, schleimige Substanz frei, die Mund und Kinn bedeckt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Adamın bedenine doğru eğiliyorsun. Tenindeki ve kıyafetlerindeki sayısız kan izine rağmen subayın ciddi bir yarası yok. Fark edilebilir tek yarası yüzünde: Burnunun şekli bozulmuş ve kırmızı, balçığımsı bir madde akıp ağzını ve çenesini kirletiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You bend over the body. Despite the numerous bloodstains on his skin and clothes, the officer had not been seriously wounded. The only noticeable injury is on his face — his nose is disfigured, and a red, slimy substance is streaming from it, staining his mouth and chin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Adamın bedenine doğru eğiliyorsun. Tenindeki ve kıyafetlerindeki sayısız kan izine rağmen subayın ciddi bir yarası yok. Fark edilebilir tek yarası yüzünde: Burnunun şekli bozulmuş ve kırmızı, balçığımsı bir madde akıp ağzını ve çenesini kirletiyor.{/n}
